title:
Energy identity for the incompressible Cahn--Hilliard/Navier--Stokes
  system with non-degenerate mobility
abstract:
We consider the Cahn--Hilliard/Navier--Stokes system with non-degenerate
mobility in the space-periodic case, describing the flow of two viscous
immiscible and incompressible Newtonian fluids with matched densities. We
identify sufficient conditions on the velocity field for weak solutions to
satisfy an energy identity, improving previous results on the literature.
